author: The Times-Journal
title: Roundhouse Foundation allocates $6 million to rural Oregon food banks
text:
Roundhouse Foundation allocates $6 million to rural Oregon food banks
Grants available to eligible organizations that support community access to fresh food and bolster regional economies
SISTERS, OR â€” With costs of living continuing to rise, the number of people experiencing food insecurity is higher than ever, now affecting 47.4 million Americans a year. In Oregon, those living in rural and remote areas are at even higher risk of food insecurity.
Roundhouse Foundation is allocating $6 million dollars over the next three years to support rural Oregon food banks. "We are responding...
